downloadTitle: RPA Playbook for SAP GUI Automation with Power Automate: API flows, UI flows, and Power Automate Desktop
downloadDescription: In this playbook you will learn how to apply simple to advanced, no-code to pro-code SAP automation techniques, leveraging  Power Automate, UI flows and the recently announced public preview of Power Automate Desktop.

downloadFile.name: RPA Playbook for SAP GUI based automation with Power Automate v1-2.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/c/7/6/c7696264-23e3-440d-8cf8-03de58568e70/RPA Playbook for SAP GUI based automation with Power Automate v1-2.pdf

detailsSection:
In this playbook you will learn how to apply simple to advanced, no-code to pro-code SAP automation techniques, leveraging  Power Automate, UI flows and the recently announced public preview of Power Automate Desktop.

Whether you just want to learn about the enterprise automation capabilities in Power Automate or have an upcoming SAP automation project that involves Power Automate, this playbook is for you.

Get your copy of the playbook today and start automating SAP GUI-based workloads with Power Automate.
detailsSection_file_name: RPA Playbook for SAP GUI based automation with Power Automate v1-2.pdf
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is an Adobe Reader file. Users who do not have Adobe Reader can download it from Adobe.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To open the document immediately, choose Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer, choose Save.
